mapper.select: SELECT NDate ndate, NTime ntime, SpecimenNo lisybbh, TestIndex2 exam_code, ProfileTestIndex item_code, NValue exam_item_values_number, SValue exam_item_values_short, ReviewNotes ref_range, Status status, Units units, PrtOrder lis_code, DOCNAME exam_doctor, RENAME audit_name, ASPATNAME inspect_name, ReviewDate audit_date, ReviewTime audit_time, PatExt3 inspect_code, ReceiveDate, ReceiveTime FROM dbo.V_HONGQIAOLIS WHERE PatIndex =#{patientcode8} ORDER BY ReceiveDate DESC,ReceiveTime DESC
